events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I'm not happy with the product and would like to request a refund.
The customer's request for a refund was categorized under the Refund cluster based on the keywords in their message.
The case has been assigned to support agent Lisa M. for handling the refund procedure.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request and will do my best to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you are requesting a refund so I can proceed?
My order number is 458712. The product did not function as described and I feel it is not worth the price I paid.
Thank you for the information. I will initiate the refund process immediately. You should see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 5â€“7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after confirming the initiation of the refund transaction.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund arrived yesterday. Thank you for your prompt support throughout this process.
The case has now been closed following successful refund completion and customer confirmation.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback about the support experience.
